text: 35|27|(napiyē!) Niccayamāka allāhtāṉ vāṉattiliruntu maḻaiyai iṟakkivaikkiṟāṉ eṉpatai nīr kavaṉikkavillaiyā? Nām ataik koṇṭu palavitamāṉa (rucikaḷaiyum) niṟaṅkaḷaiyu(mu)ṭaiya kāykaṉikaḷai veḷiyākkukiṟōm. Iṉṉum malaikaḷil veḷḷai, cikappu mutaliya pala niṟaṅkaḷ uḷḷavaiyum, cuttakkaruppu niṟam uḷḷavaiyum irukkiṉṟaṉa
